clinical_study.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Induces Myocardial RISK Signaling Pathway Via High Mobility Group Box 1 Preconditioning in Patients Undergoing Valvular Heart Surgery

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to investigate whether RIPC protects the heart against I/R injury through recruitment of the RISK pathway in human subjects. Also, we are to investigate whether RIPC activates RISK pathway by exerting high mobility group box 1 (HMGB 1) preconditioning effect.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Prevention

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the RIPC-induced activation of RISK pathway by comparison of the phosphorylation of the PI3K-Akt and Erk 1/2 at the left ventricular myocardium between the RIPC and control groups
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before the CPB institution, 10 min after CPB wean-off
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of the RIPC-induced activation of RISK pathway at the myocardium : obtaining the 3X3mm myocardial tissue by punch needle biopsy at left ventricle by cardiac surgeon -> immunoblot analysis with the use of antibody of ERK1/2, phosphorylated ERK1/2, Akt, Phosphorylated Akt.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of RIPC-induced release of HMGB1 by comparison of serum HMGB1 level by ELISA between the RIPC and control groups
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before the CPB institution, 10 min after CPB wean-off
secondary_outcome.description: Effect of RIPC on the serum HMGB1 level : Sampling of 5 mL arterial blood -> measurement of serum HMGB1 using the HMGB1 ELISA kit II

clinical_study.condition: Patients Undergoing Elective Lumbar Spinal Surgery

intervention.intervention_name: Remote ischemic preconditioning at left upper arm
intervention.description: Placement of automated cuff-inflator on the left upper arm after induction of anesthesia RIPCgroup-3 cycles of 5 min ischemia (250mmHg inflation) & 5 min reperfusion (deflation)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Seventy two adults scheduled for elective AVR surgery for degenerative AS
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient with diabetes taking older sulphonylureas, LV ejection fraction <50%
